title: Senior Consultant
summary: Application and maintenance development for TSA; lead developer and CI/DevOps owner for developer network systems.
responsibilities: Full-stack .NET maintenance development (C#, T-SQL, JavaScript, Telerik); upgraded application from .NET 1.1 to 3.5; created integration + unit test suites reducing logged errors from hundreds/day to several/week.

Release management: lead developer on a three-person team; moved ~15 releases through TSA SDLC; authored SDLC documents; performed maintenance work required to pass C&A (Certification and Authorization).

DevOps: built a CI system evolving from VSS/Luntbuild/Flyspray to Subversion/Collabnet/TeamCity; managed servers/workstations on developer network; performed DBA tasks for MySQL and MSSQL (upgrades, schema comparison, security hardening).
.NET modernization: refactored a .NET/C#/LLBGen travel scheduler app for reuse by a new department; upgraded ASP.NET scheduling/travel app to 2.0 and identified XSS/SQL injection vulnerabilities.
Data warehouse: extracted data from a schema lacking foreign keys into a star schema for loading into SQL Server Analysis Services cubes.
SharePoint: built a proof-of-concept web part for a management statistics dashboard.
